OOC: Wow, you guys really don't like organics!  Well, wait till you see som=
ething you probably forgot about that Skulletron had......And R.Dahl, you w=
eren't around when Skulletron was here, so this should be a nice surprise..=
...And if you don't get it, ask somebody, like Yanshosh, who was here for i=
t, and who actually had it used on Zardus.  And when I was a cheap-ass and =
used it to "control" the CF....(I still regret that to this very day.)

IC:=
 Slaughter got a look of disgust on his face when he found that Motormaster=
 wasn't very edible, which is kind of hard to believe, considering how disg=
usting Slaughter's face already is.  He felt Motormaster grab him, then sud=
denly a bunch of vines had him tangled again.  This left him completely vul=
nerable to Scourge and Godfather's hits, which all made contact with him.  =
Slime and some flesh flew everywhere as the hits slammed into Slaughter's b=
ody.

      "RRRGGGHHAAAAA!!!!!!!" Slaughter yelled in sheer pain.

      S=
laughter decided to do something he hadn't done since he was Skulletron....=
.......Slaughter prepared to connect his mind with Motormaster's......

OOC=
: Ok,  would somebody else like the honours of explaining Skullet-er-Slaugh=
ter's mind ability?
